alert.note: Alert for North Laramie Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 3:29PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Converse County through 415 PM MDT... At 329 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Boxelder, or 23 miles southeast of Casper, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Deer Creek around 355 PM MDT. Laprele Reservoir around 415 PM MDT. This includes Interstate 25 in Wyoming between mile markers 153 and 161. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for east central Wyoming.
